attributes.action: Allow students taking the new GCSE to bring blank anthologies to the exam
attributes.background: In previous years, students were allowed to take in blank anthologies so they had the piece of text in front of them. In the new exam students are not allowed to so, essentially, the exam is heavily based on memory. We cannot analyse a poem without the text!

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/172405
